mission.posting: We've received a contract specifically for @Pretence, to investigate a network of a defunct organization in search of bespoke software

email.subject: A second to forget
email.body:
It's a second to forgive, it's a second to forget ---- Greetings, Pretence
You don't have a direct way of hiring you, so I had to go through a lot of effort to hire you for this job. And so I hope that you can live up to your reputation of a highly-experienced operative.
I have a rather specific request, there's been this one corpo "EnTech", rumour is that they have been making some insane software deep within their organization that is capable of overcoming whatever is thrown at it. And some folk on the net are offering to sell their "improved" build of it, but I want to see if the thing existed in the first place and get my hands on some information concerning the project, but knowing the nature of the sellers, I don't wanna raise any eyebrows, so I need an unrelated actor for this op, and of course, I want this done clandestinely. What I'm looking for is not some random .decs or what not, but files that actually prove actual development, namely RUNTIME.dlls and .sln files.
There's an entry point to EnTech's network, their website, you can start there. From what I know EnTech had a tendency of naming their mainframes after gods. Upload all the files you find to my drop-server directly, no middlemen. Once you're done, I'll be contacting you.
Cometh the hour -Strife, The Reigning King of Chaos

attachments.note: - Find any .sln and .dll files relating to EnTech's "big project" - Upload it to the Nightwave Drop server
